column19: Introduction to version control; Documentation; Collaborative distributed version control; Managing complexity and modular code development; Automated testing; Building portable code with CMake; Reproducible research
column20: I am used to write my own code for bioinformatic analyses. However, recently I started a bioinformatics postdoc position where I am collaborating in many different projects and with many different people whom have a wide range of bioinformatics skills. So, even if I know the basics on version control and environment management,  I want to get help to be able to implement it in my daily work (as I don't usually do), and learn how to administer a shared project and learn the "do and don't" for reproducible and collaborative research. Also, as my code is getting more complex, I  would also like to discuss how to manage complexity and modular code development.
